suppose you have the device eth0 with ip 192.168.1.2 netmask 255.255.255.0, you can add a route to say 192.168.4.1 by doing this: "sudo route add -net 192.168.4.0 netmask 255.255.255.0 gw 192.168.1.1 dev eth0", where 192.168.1.1 is the next hop
